name: SelectArrow
description:
Displays an element positioned against the select menu anchor.
Renders a `<div>` element.

className.type: string | ((state: { open, side, align, uncentered }) => string)
className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

render.type: React.ReactElement | ((props: unknown, state: { open, side, align, uncentered }) => React.ReactElement)
render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

data-open.description: Present when the select popup is open.

data-closed.description: Present when the select popup is closed.

data-uncentered.description: Present when the select arrow is uncentered.

data-anchor-hidden.description: Present when the anchor is hidden.

data-side.description: Indicates which side the select is positioned relative to the trigger.
